divs: Sighting DetailsIn bed, looking out window. Bright, but not blinding, white circle went west in sky. No noise. Not an aircraft. Checked ISS data this morning and found no correlation. Felt no surprise other than happiness. I am a former MUFON F.I.
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Allentown
There were no other sightings in Allentown on or around July 25th 2013
